subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Palestinians shelve 'martyr mouse' kids show

05/10/07 05:42 AM, EDT
After an episode made global headlines earlier this week, the Palestinian government has shelved a Hamas-owned children's TV show starring a Mickey Mouse lookalike that urged Palestinian children to take up arms against America and Israel.
FULL STORY
